column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////3.75 is what I would rate this venue. I was not able to get a reservation (first available was a month away) so I did sit at the high tables near the bar. Service was great. Food (halibut
column2: bone marrow and dry aged bone in ribeye) were good but nothing out of this world. Now the dessert (chocolate cream pie) was a solid 4 and a must try!
